text: Süper Lig is a football league which is top division in Turkey. == League name == * 1957-1959 : Turkish Federation Cup * 1959-2001 : First League * 2001-present : Süper Lig == Club 2010/11 == * Beşiktaş * Sivasspor * Trabzonspor * Fenerbahçe * Galatasaray * Bursaspor * Kayserispor * Gaziantepspor * İstanbul * Konyaspor * Eskişehirspor * Antalyaspor * Ankaragücü * Gençlerbirliği * Kardemir Karabükspor * Manisaspor * Bucaspor * Kasımpaşa == Champions == Season Champions Runner-up Third place 2001/02 Galatasaray Fenerbahçe Beşiktaş 2002/03 Beşiktaş Galatasaray Gençlerbirliği 2003/04 Fenerbahçe Trabzonspor Beşiktaş 2004/05 Fenerbahçe Trabzonspor Galatasaray 2005/06 Galatasaray Fenerbahçe Beşiktaş 2006/07 Fenerbahçe Beşiktaş Galatasaray 2007/08 Galatasaray Fenerbahçe Beşiktaş 2008/09 Beşiktaş Sivasspor Trabzonspor === Former champions === == References == Category:Football leagues in Europe
title: Süper Lig
